Miguel
Miguel is a software engineer working for a national organization. He also has a PhD in Astronomy. He is probably the main driving force putting this project into action and making this longtime dream a reality. He cares deeply about the well-being of children in general and wants to guarantee that the horrid conditions in some orphanages cease to exist.
Kathy
Kathy has a PhD in Biomedical Science and she currently does research on AIDS. It is her dream to rescue children living in the streets and make sure that someone cares for them affectionately. In the Summer of 2004, she went to India to volunteer at an orphanage. The children in the shelter had a profound effect on her, and this experience intensified her desire to help orphans around the world. She is also a strong advocate of teamwork.
Sandra
Sandra is a translator for a large online company with a Master Degree in English Language and Literature. She joined the team in June of 2011 and has been a dedicated and loyal driving force that motivates all of us to continue developing this project. She has volunteered helping homeless children in her community and wants to continue helping children in meaningful ways.
Ginette
Ginette is a dental hygienist with strong principles. She has experience volunteering with youth in need and knows how rewarding it is to help others. For this reason, she wants to continue making an impact in other children's lives by helping to develop this project. Like Sandra, she joined the team in June of 2011 and her attitude also motivates the rest of us to continue.
Priya
Priya is a software engineer working for a local engineering company. She also volunteered at an orphanage in India, and the impact of her experience there made her seek ways to continue helping improve the lives of orphans. She joined the team a bit later, but is also very motivated to help fulfill the cause of OWB.
